headline: NRG Energy Honors Business Customers During Fifth Annual Excellence in Energy Awards
summary: HOUSTON, November 14, 2024--NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE: NRG) celebrated some of its top energy customers today for their remarkable efforts in community, sustainability, and energy efficiency during the fifth annual Excellence in Energy Awards.
